description:
Learn To Organize And Maintain Your Virtual Office Using Microsoft 365: The Powerful, Everything-You-Need-In-One-Easy-Bundle Online Suite

Office 365 is not your traditional, on-premise based professional suite. With Office 365, Microsoft made a strong move to remain vital to business professionals in a rapidly changing, hyper-mobile economy.

For years there was a disconnect between the world’s most popular desktop suite (Microsoft Office) and the rapid shift to mobile computing. Office 365 effectively bridges the gap, providing the familiar tools you depend on with a modern, cloud-based environment for sharing and collaboration.

This Course Not Only Gets You Oriented and Organized – It Shows You How to Use The Power Of the New Cloud Based Suite To Maximize Your Productivity, From Anywhere, Anytime

The popular and familiar tools are all here – including all the applications and tools that have been the foundation of the computer-based business revolution. But with 365, it has a new level of agility and integration that businesses and people have longed for.

Whether You Have An iPhone, Android, Windows Phone Or If You Rely On A BlackBerry, Office 365 Works Seamlessly With Them All

Topics covered in this course include: Advantages Of An Virtual Office On The Cloud

· Setting Up Email / Outlook / Exchange

· Getting Organized – Flags, Tags, and Folders, and Categories

· How OneDrive Tools Can Help You Do More With Your Documents

· Storing, Sharing, and Collaborating With SharePoint Sites

· Communicating With Lync

· Using Office 365 With Your Mobile Device

· Security, Compliance, and Encryption Options

· Password And Administration Made Easy

· Customizing Office 365 With Apps & Templates

Whether You Want To Tap Into Your Virtual Office When Traveling, Or Have The Convenience Of A Cloud-Based Office To Toggle From Home Or Office – This Course Teaches You How To Manage This New Cutting Edge Business Resource
title: Office365 Essentials
